name: PHP Platform API Documentation
description: Documentation for working with the PHP Platform REST API including authentication, requests, responses, and examples

name: Access Levels and Permissions
description: Documentation for the access control system including access levels, user groups, permission hierarchy, and the access property in API responses

name: OAuth2 Authentication Guide
description: Guide for OAuth2 token authentication, automatic token refresh, and API key signing using Ed25519 for server-to-server communication

name: KLB API Describe Tool Manual
description: Guide for using the klbfw-describe command-line utility to explore and understand KLB API endpoints

name: KarpelesLab Frontend Framework (klbfw)
description: Documentation for the JavaScript library for communicating with KarpelesLab API services from both browser and Node.js environments

name: KLB Framework i18n Integration Guide
description: Guide for enabling internationalization (i18n) on your KLB Framework site using i18next

name: AtOnline API Flutter Package
description: Documentation for the Flutter package that provides tools for interacting with AtOnline.com APIs including CMS, Naka, and other services

name: KLB Upload Protocol Specification
description: Low-level upload protocol documentation for building client implementations in environments without a native klbfw SDK

name: User Flow v2 Documentation
description: Guide for implementing the flexible, step-by-step process for user authentication, registration, and account management workflows

name: Stripe Express Checkout Integration Guide
description: Guide for implementing Stripe Express Checkout (Apple Pay, Google Pay) in Vue.js applications with order creation and payment processing

name: Media Variations API Documentation
description: Documentation for requesting and using transformed versions of media files (images and audio) through API endpoints with various filters and formats

name: Frontend HTMX Integration Guide
description: Guide for building server-rendered frontends using HTMX with the platform's templating system including template directives, REST API integration, and routing

name: Version Service Worker Installation Guide
description: Guide for setting up a service worker that adds version headers to asset requests for better cache management and version tracking in Vue.js applications

name: Karpeles Lab Inc Integration Documentation
description: Overview of all documentation for integrating with Karpeles Lab Inc systems and APIs
